text:
27
PROGRAM OFFERING
NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING
Title VOICES OF EUROPE II
Type: Interview
Time: 30.00
No.: 26 programs
Origin: Milton Mayer-U. of Chicago
(Grnat-in-Aid)
Audience: Adult
Serial Number: 5>7~7
Release Date: January 6, 19^7
Many of the Network stations are familiar with the work of Milton Mayer in
collecting a series of interesting interviews with Europeans from all walks of
life. His previous series for the Network ran for over a year, and now we are
pleased to announce a new series of 26 30-minute interviews from Europe.
This series is made possible through a grant-in-aid from the Educational Tele¬
vision and Radio Center to the University of Chicago, where the programs are
being edited. Since this editing is now in progress, we are unable to give
specific information concerning the interviewees and the subject of their con¬
versations with Mr. Mayer. This information will be in our hands early next
month, and we will then rush it to all stations.
